Name: Dead Night
About the game: Dead Night - is a simple and incredibly hardcore 3D shooter where you have to fight to various monsters alone. The purpose of the game is non-stopping fights and seeking things you need. There are three large levels including different difficulty degrees. Besides, there are three kinds of monsters that are really anxious to tear you to pieces. Don’t worry about it as you have big weapons arsenal, so you will be able to win. Collect ammos and keys, explore new locations, find medical kits, and kill monsters. You won’t be bored!
